original_text: Then I saw that the bright glory of Israel's God was there. It was like the glory that I had seen beside the River Kebar.
korean_text: 이스라엘 하나님의 영광이 거기에 있는데 내가 들에서 본 모습과 같더라

sentences.original_text: that the bright glory of Israel's God was there
that I had seen beside the River Kebar
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그발 강 근처에서 보았던 바로 그 영광이었다
